title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP in A Superyacht Life Missions
content:
Looking to earn your sea legs? Owners of a Galaxy Super Yacht can visit Captain Brendan Darcy on the bridge (or give him a call) to launch A Superyacht Life missions and earn 2X GTA$ and RP all week long (GTA+ Members will earn a juicy 4X Rewards).

Completing any A Superyacht Life mission now through May 15 will get you an extra GTA$100,000 bonus (delivered within 72 hours of completion), while the current Weekly Challenge for completing three missions lands you an additional GTA$100,000.
